message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $125 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest! $90 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $110. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value you placed on the product. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $95. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.
